body:
[Sink]: It's an old sink, but it seems functional. 

[1]: [Inspect the sink] 
[2]: [Wash your face] 
[3]: [Leave the sink alone]
title: Start1

body:
[Sink]: You weren't always the best at general knowledge, but you remember that sinks were used to wash hands and faces. You're not sure why you'd want to wash your face right now, but you're not sure why you'd want to inspect the sink either. 

[1]: [Judge the old sink] 
[2]: [Wash your face] 
[3]: [Leave the sink alone]
title: InspectSink

body:
[You]: "You old colonial sink, I hope you break one day!"
[Sink] The old sink does not react, but you feel proud of what you have just done. 

[1]: [Wash your face] 
[2]: [Leave the sink alone]
title: JudgeSink

body:
[You]: You splash some water on your face. It's cold, but refreshing at last. 

[1]: [Inspect the sink] 
[2]: [Leave the sink alone]
title: WashFace
